Title: Requires certain health insurance plans cover annual electrocardiograms for covered children under the age of nineteen
Summary: Requires certain health insurance plans cover annual electrocardiograms for covered children under the age of nineteen.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the social services law, in relation to requiring certain health insurance plans cover annual electrocardiograms for covered children under the age of nineteen
